mapper.select: SELECT SIGNON.MEMBERID, MEMBER.EMAIL, MEMBER.ACCSTATUS, MEMBER.ADDR1 AS address1, MEMBER.ADDR2 AS address2, MEMBER.ZIP, MEMBER.PHONE, FROM MEMBER, SIGNON WHERE MEMBER.USERID = #{userId} AND SIGNON.USERID = MEMBER.USERID

SELECT SIGNON.MEMBERID, MEMBER.EMAIL, MEMBER.ACCSTATUS, MEMBER.ADDR1 AS address1, MEMBER.ADDR2 AS address2, MEMBER.ZIP, MEMBER.PHONE, FROM MEMBER, SIGNON WHERE MEMBER.USERID = #{param1} AND SIGNON.PASSWORD = #{param2} AND SIGNON.USERID = MEMBER.USERID
SELECT USERNAME AS VALUE FROM MEMBER
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET EMAIL = #{email}, USERNAME = #{username}, STATUS = #{status}, ADDR1 = #{address1}, ADDR2 = #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city}, ACCSTATE = #{accstate}, ZIP = #{zip}, COUNTRY = #{country}, PHONE = #{phone} WHERE USERID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (EMAIL, USERNAME, ACCSTATUS, ADDR1, ADDR2, ZIP, PHONE, USERID) VALUES (#{email}, #{username}, #{status}, #{address1}, #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zip}, #{phone}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE SIGNON SET PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE USERID = #{userId}
